```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dfapply)
library(dplyr)
```


### Introducing `ggplot2`

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

### Example with a Data Set

```{r message=FALSE}
tomato <- read_csv("Tomato.csv")

glimpse(tomato)
```

#### Line Plot with `ggplot2` 

```{r}
ggplot(data=tomato, aes(x=Date, y=Average, group=1)) +
  geom_line(size = 0.5) +
  geom_point(size = 0.5)
```
